charges.charge_description: 21:846, 21:853 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS; Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess With Intent to Distribute Cocaine and Cocaine Base; Criminal Forfeiture.(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to One Hundred Eighty Eight (188) Months incarceration; followed by Five (5) Years Supervised Release; Special Assessment of $100.00 imposed. Court recommends incarceration in FCI in Cumberland, Maryland or a facility near th e Washington, D.C. Area; defendant enroll in an intensive drug treatment program

charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS; Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess With Intent to Distribute Cocaine and 50 Grams of More of Cocaine Base.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed upon motion of the government

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Unlawful Distribution of Cocaine.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed upon motion of the government
